docs.snippet: --Judge Grennen of Greenfield, Mass., accepts the Whig nomination for Lieutenant-Governor of Massachusetts. --The Legislative Committee appointed to investigate the several prisons in this State, have been engaged at the Auburn Prison for two weeks...
docs.lead_paragraph: --Judge Grennen of Greenfield, Mass., accepts the Whig nomination for Lieutenant-Governor of Massachusetts. --The Legislative Committee appointed to investigate the several prisons in this State, have been engaged at the Auburn Prison for two weeks past.

docs.snippet: FRIGHTFUL SCENE.--Yesterday afternoon, Mr. S. A. King made his first attempt to ascend in a balloon from the Zoological Garden, Falrmount. He was unable to obtain a sufficient quantity of gas, but not relishing the idea of a failure, and desirous of...
docs.lead_paragraph: FRIGHTFUL SCENE.--Yesterday afternoon, Mr. S. A. King made his first attempt to ascend in a balloon from the Zoological Garden, Falrmount. He was unable to obtain a sufficient quantity of gas, but not relishing the idea of a failure, and desirous of preventing disap-. pointment to the spectators, he undertook to risk an ascent with partial inflation, and in doing so came near losing his life.

docs.snippet: On Thursday last, after a prolonged hearing of the case, Alderman J. FRANKLIN REIGART committed the thirteen prisoners charged with participation in the Christiana homicide, to answer for the offence of high treason against the United States. The...
docs.lead_paragraph: On Thursday last, after a prolonged hearing of the case, Alderman J. FRANKLIN REIGART committed the thirteen prisoners charged with participation in the Christiana homicide, to answer for the offence of high treason against the United States. The testimony taken will be found in our columns this morning.
docs.abstract: The Law of, in connection with Christiana affair

headline.main: " If this be Treason, make the most of it."
Accident on the Union and Syracuse Railroad.; From The Utica Gazetic, of Friday, Sept. 26.

docs.snippet: On two or three occasions, lately, upon the Railroads of ENGLAND, a car has taken fire, and before the engineer could be notified of the fact, serious injury has been done to property and to life. The English press has been, in consequence, seriously...
docs.lead_paragraph: On two or three occasions, lately, upon the Railroads of ENGLAND, a car has taken fire, and before the engineer could be notified of the fact, serious injury has been done to property and to life. The English press has been, in consequence, seriously agitating the question--how shall communication be established between the passengers and the conductor? All sorts of suggestions have been made, but none have seemed just the thing.

docs.snippet: TUESDAY, SEPT. 23, 1851.--The examination of the thirteen individuals concerned in the riot at Christiana, which terminated in the death of Mr. Edward Gorsuch, was resumed before Alderman Reigart, in the Court House at Lancaster. There was a large...
docs.lead_paragraph: TUESDAY, SEPT. 23, 1851.--The examination of the thirteen individuals concerned in the riot at Christiana, which terminated in the death of Mr. Edward Gorsuch, was resumed before Alderman Reigart, in the Court House at Lancaster. There was a large number of strangers from Maryland and Pennsylvania in attendance.
docs.abstract: Charges the Christiana outrage to be treason

headline.main: THE CHRISTIANA NEGRO RIOT.; Examination of the Thirteen Prisoners, and their Commitment for High Treason.

docs.snippet: THE REVIEW YESTERDAY.--The military parade, yesterday, was the best and most imposing we have ever seen in Brooklyn, affording a display of citizen soldiery as creditable to our city as it was attractive and gratifying to the people, in point of...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE REVIEW YESTERDAY.--The military parade, yesterday, was the best and most imposing we have ever seen in Brooklyn, affording a display of citizen soldiery as creditable to our city as it was attractive and gratifying to the people, in point of discipline and general appearance. There has, since the previous annual review, ...

docs.snippet: RAILROAD ACCIDENT.--An accident occurred on the canal Road on Saturday, by which a man has probably been killed through his carelessness. When the morning train left the Mount Carmel Station, a man took his stand upon the steps of the last car,...
docs.lead_paragraph: RAILROAD ACCIDENT.--An accident occurred on the canal Road on Saturday, by which a man has probably been killed through his carelessness. When the morning train left the Mount Carmel Station, a man took his stand upon the steps of the last car, probably for the purpose of catching a ride without paying.

docs.snippet: Last evening the doors of Old Tammany were thrown open, and the Democracy called together for the purpose of ratifying the nominations of State officers made at the Syracuse Convention. A large platform had been erected at one and of the hall, over...
docs.lead_paragraph: Last evening the doors of Old Tammany were thrown open, and the Democracy called together for the purpose of ratifying the nominations of State officers made at the Syracuse Convention. A large platform had been erected at one and of the hall, over which was a large banner, which bore the following inscription:

headline.main: OPENING OF THE CAMPAIGN.; Democratic Ratification Meeting at Tammany Hall.
